Get default hyperparameter lists that can be passed to flash_models

Get default hyperparameter lists that can be passed to flash_models

get_hyperparameter_defaults(models = get_supported_models(), n = 100,
  k = 10, model_class = "classification")

Arguments

models

which algorithms?
n

Number observations
k

Number features
model_class

"classification" or "regression"

Value

List of named data frames that can be passed to flash_models

Details

Get default hyperparameters to use, e.g. in flash_models. Each data frame in the list corresponds to an algorithm, and each column in each data fram corresponds to a hyperparameter for that algorithm.

k-NN defaults are from the kknn package: kmax = 7, distance = 2 (Minkowski's exponent, i.e. Euclidean distance), kernal = "optimal"

Random forest defaults are from Intro to Statistical Learning and caret: mtry = sqrt(k), splitrule = "extratrees", min.node.size = 1 for classification, 5 for regression

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Details
